name: Final order granted (you are divorced) respondent (SWITCHED TO SOLE)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

The final order has been granted. ((isDivorce??You are now legally divorced))((isDissolution??Your civil partnership is legally ended)).

Your ((partner)) applied for the final order as a sole applicant because you did not apply. You were given 2 weeks notice of their intention to apply.

You can download a copy of your 'final order' from your account. This is the official document that shows your ((isDivorce??marriage)) ((isDissolution??civil partnership)) has legally ended. You may need this document so you should sign in and save a copy for your records. 

Sign in and download your final order: ((signin url))

Your feedback will help improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/UVM2CY/

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)
subject: Important: your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
